verses.name: Acts 9:22
verses.text: But Saul increased the more in strength, and confounded the Jews which dwelt at Damascus, proving that this is very Christ.

verses.name: Acts 9:23
verses.text: And after that many days were fulfilled, the Jews took counsel to kill him:

verses.name: Acts 9:24
verses.text: But their laying await was known of Saul. And they watched the gates day and night to kill him.

verses.name: Acts 9:25
verses.text: Then the disciples took him by night, and let him down by the wall in a basket.
